main.description: Create a new webhook for receiving Streamplace events.

url.description: The webhook URL where events will be sent.

events.description: The types of events this webhook should receive.

active.description: Whether this webhook should be active upon creation.

prefix.description: Text to prepend to webhook messages.

suffix.description: Text to append to webhook messages.

rewrite.description: Text replacement rules for webhook messages.

name.description: A user-friendly name for this webhook.

description.description: A description of what this webhook is used for.

errors.name: InvalidUrl
errors.description: The provided webhook URL is invalid or unreachable.

errors.name: DuplicateWebhook
errors.description: A webhook with this URL already exists for this user.

errors.name: TooManyWebhooks
errors.description: The user has reached their maximum number of webhooks.
